SELECT t_da_product.category_id as categoryId, product_id as productId, product_name as productName, t_da_product.created_by as createdBy, date_format(t_da_product.created_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as createdDate, t_da_product.lastupdated_by as lastupdatedBy, date_format(t_da_product.lastupdated_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as lastupdatedDate, t_da_product.active_flag as activeFlag, t_da_category.category_name as categoryName FROM t_da_product LEFT JOIN t_da_category ON t_da_product.category_id = t_da_category.category_id WHERE product_id > 0
product_name like '%$param.productName$%'
$orderByStatement$
LIMIT $first$, $pageSize$;

SELECT count(*) as total FROM t_da_product LEFT JOIN t_da_category ON t_da_product.category_id = t_da_category.category_id WHERE product_id > 0
product_name = '%$param.productName$%'

SELECT product_id as productId, product_name as productName FROM t_da_product,t_da_category WHERE t_da_product.category_id = t_da_category.category_id
product_name = '$productName$'
t_da_product.category_id = $categoryId$
product_id != $productId$
category_name = '$categoryName$'

SELECT product_id as productId, product_name as productName FROM t_da_product,t_da_category, t_da_sortable, t_da_sortable c WHERE t_da_product.category_id = t_da_category.category_id and t_da_product.product_id = t_da_sortable.sortable_key and t_da_sortable.parent_id = c.sortable_id and c.sortable_key = t_da_product.category_id and t_da_sortable.sortable_type = 'P'
product_name = '$productName$'
t_da_product.category_id = $categoryId$
category_name = '$categoryName$'
ORDER BY t_da_sortable.sortable_order asc
